body_html: The --sync-replicas mode is not fully supported yet (see the obscurely located line at: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/dist_test/scripts/dist_mnist_test.sh#L69). If you remove that flag, it should work under the asynchronous mode.
body_text: The --sync-replicas mode is not fully supported yet (see the obscurely located line at: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/dist_test/scripts/dist_mnist_test.sh#L69). If you remove that flag, it should work under the asynchronous mode.
body: The --sync-replicas mode is not fully supported yet (see the obscurely located line at: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/dist_test/scripts/dist_mnist_test.sh#L69). If you remove that flag, it should work under the asynchronous mode.
